Text.val: 08.08.2014 SH SCR19026 Button Recalculate: Extended handling to call BDC143 for all debtors within the same concentration group
13.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
29.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
17.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
16.03.2011 GB SCR16304 Extended test for allow delete

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBC_NO, DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_DEBH, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBB_ACTINVAH, DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH, DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH, DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO from :1/DEBC, :1/DEBH, :1/DEBB where DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH and DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO > 0 and DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO = :2 order by DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBC

select cast (sum (DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBC, :1/DEBB where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO > 0 and DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO = :2
select cast (sum (DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBC, :1/DCMC where DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DCMC_MARK_CODE = :2 and DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO > 0 and DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO = :3

Text.val: Not allowed to remove the main debtor from the group
Not allowed to remove the main debtor from the group as long as there are other

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_CONGROUP_DEBC_NO = :2 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null

Text.val: ... preform the recalculation for the current selected debtor
... perform the recalculation for all detors within the concentration group
... delay to keep current screen visible with info of processed debtor
